Results

How To Use

Using the Compatibility Checker

Follow these simple steps to get your results

1

Find Your IMEI

Dial *#06# on your phone or check Settings > About Phone to find your 15-digit IMEI number.

2

Enter Your Details

Type your IMEI number or search for your phone model in the compatibility checker.

3

Get Instant Results

See if your phone is compatible with Vouch's AT&T network, including 5G and LTE support.

4

Start Saving

If compatible, you can bring your phone to Vouch and start saving immediately.

Why This Matters

Why Check Compatibility First?

Not all phones work on every network. Vouch Mobile uses AT&T's network, which requires specific LTE and 5G bands. Phones purchased from Verizon or Sprint (CDMA-only devices) may not be compatible. Checking compatibility before switching ensures a seamless transition and prevents frustration.

  • AT&T uses GSM technology - some older CDMA phones won't work
  • 5G requires specific bands (n5, n77, n260, n261) for fastest speeds
  • LTE bands 12, 17, and 29 provide the best coverage
  • Carrier-locked phones need to be unlocked before switching

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about the Compatibility Checker

Dial *#06# on your phone to display the IMEI. You can also find it in Settings > About Phone on Android or Settings > General > About on iPhone.

If your current phone isn't compatible, you can purchase a new unlocked phone from any retailer. Vouch works with any unlocked GSM phone that supports AT&T's LTE bands.

Yes, your phone must be carrier-unlocked to use with Vouch Mobile. Contact your current carrier to request an unlock if your phone is still locked.

If your phone supports AT&T's 5G bands (n5, n77, n260, or n261), you'll have access to 5G speeds where available. Our checker will tell you which bands your phone supports.
